keywords: Snack,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Corn Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Note: To make this gluten free all you need to do is substitute the self raising flour for gluten free self raising flour. And be sure to check the label on the creamed corn doesn't contain a wheat thickener.
Place flour, stock and chives in a large mixing bowl, stir to combine and make a well in the centre.
Using a fork or whisk, mix in the eggs and milk. Add drained corn kernels and creamed corn and stir well until combined.
Heat oil and drop one heaped tbs of fritter mixture into the pan. Cook 12 minutes each side until golden and cooked through. Repeat with remaining mixture. Enjoy hot or cold.
